Talk_0005:
Along with those, add <clr:0000>rock salt<clr:ffff> and your
choice of <clr:0000>fish <clr:ffff>and cook them all together.
Ta-da! A <clr:0000>fish pie<clr:ffff> ready to eat!<sp:0:4:0>If you don't have <clr:0000>rock salt<clr:ffff>, you might find
some by mining from ore deposits.
Talk_0006:
First, you'll want to buy <clr:0000>goat butter <clr:ffff>here
at the Slippery Falcon.
Talk_0007:
Simply cook <clr:0000>goat butter <clr:ffff>and an <clr:0000>apple<clr:ffff>
together, and the <clr:0000>hot buttered apple<clr:ffff>
is complete!<sp:0:4:0>Adding a <clr:0000>spicy pepper<clr:ffff> to the mix is a
good way to warm up your whole body.
Talk_0001:
It looks to be a collection of the Slippery
Falcon's recommended recipes.
Talk_0008:
Some ingredients may be in short supply
due to the blizzard. We appreciate your
patience as we restock.
Talk_0002:
First, you'll want to buy <clr:0000>Tabantha wheat<clr:ffff>,
<clr:0000>goat butter<clr:ffff>, and <clr:0000>cane sugar<clr:ffff> here at the
Slippery Falcon.
Talk_0003:
Toss these three ingredients in a pot
alongside your favorite type of <clr:0000>nut<clr:ffff> to
make nutcake.<sp:0:4:0>And for an added kick, try substituting
the nut with something else! An <clr:0000>apple<clr:ffff> is
a good starting point to experiment with.
Talk_0004:
First, you'll want to buy <clr:0000>Tabantha
wheat <clr:ffff>and <clr:0000>goat butter<clr:ffff> here at the
Slippery Falcon.
